ygData.subject: Fw: magical 2h-slashing
ygData.msgSnippet: Check out this site for equipment info http://eq.stomped.com/ ... From: Whitcraft,David  To:  Sent: Tuesday, July
ygData.messageBody:
Check out this site for equipment info

http://eq.stomped.com/

----- Original Message -----
From: Whitcraft,David <DWHITCRAFT@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, July 27, 1999 2:33 PM
Subject: RE: [EQCheats] magical 2h-slashing


> From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
>
> Lota of 2H Slashing magics out there. Go to EQ'Lizer for a good list
> (http://gameznet.com/eq/). Bone Bladed Claymore is a very common wanted 2H
> slashing. I sold one I got in Befallen for 350pp, but this was about a
month
> and a half ago. I imagine they go for about half this or less now,
although
> I'm not sure.
>
> Need to be about 16-20th level, in a party to get this item, and be
prepared
> to camp for hours on end. My party camped the lower level of Befallen all
> day (12+ hours) and we got 2 BBCs that day. Hrm...might have been 3.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Omeg Felligan [mailto:omeg_felligan@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, July 27, 1999 2:05 PM
> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQCheats] magical 2h-slashing
>
>
> From: "Omeg Felligan" <omeg_felligan@...>
>
> what is there for this?
>
> thanks,
> Omeg
>
